executive_summary: Acme Retail Co is positioned for growth with targeted improvements in inventory accuracy, omnichannel fulfillment efficiency, and customer analytics.
current_state: Acme operates two brick-and-mortar stores with a growing e-commerce channel. Systems include a POS, spreadsheet-based inventory counts, and a basic email marketing platform.
findings: Stock accuracy below 90% leads to lost sales and over-ordering
Order picking is manual with limited batching and routing
Customer data is siloed between in-store and online systems
recommendations: Implement cycle counting with ABC classification and barcode scanning
Introduce batch picking and standardized packing workflows
Consolidate customer data and build RFM segmentation
next_steps: Run a 4-week pilot for cycle counting in the top 20% SKUs
Document current fulfillment steps and measure baseline KPIs
Evaluate a lightweight CDP or data warehouse for unification
